review_data.title: Dinner
review_data.content: Very nice decorated restaurant , friendly staff but the food is not so good for my taste and is not even cheap . Maybe some other dishes are good but what we had wasn’t nothing special ☹️

review_data.title: Last days of dining out past 7:00pm in Zurich
review_data.content: As the reviewer below me pointed out the food does get to the table a bit too fast. That’s a good thing if you’re hungry, however not so good for the quality of the ingredients. We still enjoyed our meal; I was craving Chinese food...More

review_data.title: Very good food but a bit of fast food ambience
review_data.content: We loved the food at Khujug. Very tastey and high quality. The service was fast and friendly. We spent a nice family dinner at Khujug and the service was too fast for us. 5-10 minutes after our order, all the food was on the table....More

review_data.title: Sehr zu empfehlen
review_data.content: Sehr leckere, authentische asiatische Küche. Die angegeben Schärfegrade sollte man nicht ignorieren.

review_data.title: dinner for two
review_data.content: i am sorry to say; but dissapointed! the restaurant decoration is really nice i must say, the staff friendly but the food is not great for my taste.

review_data.title: Tasty Chinese food in Zurich!
review_data.content: Had lunch here by chance, walking around the city. Nice place. Delicious food at the right price. Recommended.

review_data.title: schönes Ambiente, leckeres Essen

review_data.title: Very good Chinese restaurant
review_data.content: I came here with colleagues, as one of tgem is chinese and recommended the place. It was a really nice experience, with good food and nice atmosphere.

review_data.title: Wonderful atmosphere
review_data.content: I was recently at Khujug for dinner and highly recommend the place. The atmosphere is wonderful and the restaurant is beautifully decorated. The food is also great and the hot pots are a thing to behold (huge and really good).

review_data.title: Good chinese restaurant. Simple and cozy.
review_data.content: Good chinese restaurant. Simple, cozy atmosphere and great service. To be in zurich, definitely has good prices.

review_data.title: Excellent Chinese food
review_data.content: Khujug is a nice Chinese Restaurant for casual dining. Soothing decor, fast service, delicious food. Tried Shrimp with black pepper sauce, shrimp dumplings and Spicy Lamb with onion, chili's and leak. Shrimp in black pepper sauce was outstanding and Spicy lamb was hot and delicious....More

review_data.title: Lovely food, superb service, family friendly
review_data.content: Delicious food, nice selection of beverages, very clean and nicely decorated place; but above all, the service was fantastic. Very helpful and attentive. We definitely will be coming back!
